ABOUT.talk-01: Hello, I am a German-speaking frontend developer living in Loma Plata, Paraguay. Driven by the endless possibilities in the IT world, I am passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications.
ABOUT.talk-02: I can work effectively remote from Paraguay and have the advantage of being available for work in the German-speaking region even during late night hours, thanks to the different time zones.

PORTFOLIO.title: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

PROJECTS.join-description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.loco-description: Jump-and-Run game: A game developed using object-oriented programming. Defeat enemies on the way to the final boss and collect items along the way.
PROJECTS.loco-alt: Image of project: El Pollo Loco.

CONTACT.title: Want to discuss a new project?
CONTACT.expression: Say hello! let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
